parteSql: (select oportunidad from advAboUsu[empresa].dbo.oporcli where oporcli.icodopor = segcli.icodopor)

cast( isnull(convert( int, case when oporcli.campofecha1 is null then -5000  else case when fechacierre is null then convert( int, datediff(day, getdate(), 
oporcli.campofecha1)) else convert( int, datediff(day, oporcli.campofecha1, fechacierre)) end end), -5000) as int)
